content: fish bowl hat this fun fishy pattern was inspired by mc escher s designs the hat has a light and plush texture and a bit of a slouch on top there isalotof potential to get creative with the colors of the fish fit meant for an adult head of approx 23 diameter notions 2 75mm circular needles or double-pointed needles 3 25mm circular needles or double-pointed needles tapestry needle stitch marker yarn 150 meters / 164 yards fingering weight yarn for color 1 130 meters / 142 yards fingering weight yarn for color 2 gauge approx 26 stitches / 4 in colorwork pattern starting with the smaller needles cast on 136 stitches in color 1 join in the round careful not to twist stitches and mark the beginning of row work k2 p2 ribbing for 2 5 or your preferred length switch to larger needles and next round knit all stitches colorwork row 1-3 k1 color 1 k1 color 2 for 3 rounds row 4 knit all in color 1 row 5-59 work main colorwork chart catch floats longer than 5 stitches you should only ever need to catch color 1 row 60-63 work finishing colorwork chart break color 2 decrease using only color 1 row 1 k6 k2tog k7 k2tog row 2 4 6 8 knit all stitches row 3 k5 k2tog k6 k2tog row 5 k4 k2tog k5 k2tog row 7 k3 k2tog k4 k2tog row 9 k2 k2tog k3 k2tog row 10 k1 k2tog k2 k2tog row 11 k2tog k1 k2tog break yarn leaving a long tail to thread through remaining stitches pull tight and secure weave in all ends enjoy your fishy hat main colorwork chart finishing colorwork chart key ■ color 1 □ color 2 k - knit k2tog - knit two stitches together p - purl sts - stitches
